name: Shell Fighter
description: In a future of cybernetic enhancements and body transplants, one nightclub hides a dark secret. The fight club hosts brain transplanted combatants tearing at and shredding their cloned shells without remorse. Will you be able to take on the life of a fighter, bound by the club owner to train in the gym until you are called forth to fight as you lose what little connection you had to your transient body?
